SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

br.octahedron.cotopaxi.auth
Annotation Type AuthorizationRequired

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={METHOD,TYPE})
public @interface AuthorizationRequired

This annotation should be used to indicate that a controller method needs authentication and authorization. To use this annotation both AbstractAuthenticationInterceptor and AbstractAuthorizationInterceptor should have implementations.

Author:
Danilo Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

Optional Element Summary
 String actionName
          The action name to be used to authorize.
 boolean showForbiddenPage
           
 

actionName

public abstract String actionName
The action name to be used to authorize. If not defined, it will use the controller name.

Default:
"%%%controller_name%%%"

showForbiddenPage

public abstract boolean showForbiddenPage
Default:
true
